node.label: Build Rules, Process, other, not using Assembler

Current Status 1) not clear separation of different phases (compilation vs execution) 2) Same objects (KnowledgeBuilder/KieBase) used for two semantically-different scopes, so containing data/methods for both code-pat 3) hard to isolate/reuse/refactor code specific to only one of the two phases
Build Rules, Process, other, not using Assembler

Proposed Status 1) clear separation of different phases (compilation vs execution) 2) Different objects used for two semantically-different scopes, each containing only data/methods for specific code-pat 3) easier isolation/reuse/refactoring of code specific to only one of the two phases
Load Rules, Process, other, not using Assembler
